description: A waterproof and warm jacket for unpredictable weather, this zip-up is insulated and lined with thermal-reflective tech to retain heat. The hood, hem and cuffs adjust to your liking, while multiple pockets help keep you organized.
name: Columbia Sportswear Point Park Insulated Jacket - Big - Mens

specs.value: 100% Polyester, 100% Polyester 2L Ripstop, 80g Microtemp XF II 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
